channel.title: Fediverse Usernames: User List or Directory
channel.description: A lot of the people on this server have a Fediverse presence. Is there a central list anywhere that would make it possible to find everyone at their home server, so they can be followed on the Fediverse in addition to this site?

item.title: Fediverse Usernames: User List or Directory
item.dc:creator: how
item.description:
There’s no single user directory, but you may check individual account profiles for their (self-maintained) “On the Fediverse” field.

Instead of trying to follow too many people, I would recommend to subscribe to the #ActivityPub and #Fediverse tags, then selectively follow people posting there based on your interests.
